pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
I was thinking making the `iff` with the integrals being equal, so to have it the same shape as `MeasureTheory.integral_eq_zero_iff_of_nonneg_ae`. 
We could state it as `f =ᵐ[μ] g` iff the conjunction of these two statements, but I'm not sure if that will be super useful. I'll let you decide how to finally state this.

bors d+

:v: RemyDegenne can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
Note: my second comment that some supporting lemmas could be used here to simplify the proof still stands

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8004057785/job/21860662987)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8004057785/job/21860663184)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8004057785/job/21860663571)
Also, can you add supporting lemmas until this is mostly just a sequence of rewrites? (e.g. `sub_ae_eq_zero(_iff_ae_eq)` and `sub_nonneg_ae_iff(_ae_le)`)
Sorry, I did not see that second comment. I'll add those lemmas.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: add `integral_eq_iff_of_ae_le`
